attributes.action: It’s time we forced car Manufacturers to sell their cars in uk , with Mud Flaps
attributes.additional_details:
. Fit all Cars with them 
I have had 8 wind shields ( glass ) chipped over the years. And the mot changes so if your chip is on driver side you need to replace .and. Ok insure will but premiums go up . 
Not only that one time I got such a fright and loud stone my car went off the road.
Thanks 
Mr Lauder in Scotland UK
attributes.background:
It’s a simple fix to slow down the cost to driver and safety .

Lorries need them fitted but cars don’t by law

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure if you'd like all new cars to be fitted with mud flaps or if you'd like all cars to be required to have them by a specific date. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
